text: Adrian Szőke (born 1 July 1998) is a Serbian-born Hungarian footballer who plays for Heracles Almelo playing as an attacking midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Adrian Szőke at Heracles.nl * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Senta Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungary youth international footballers Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbia youth international footballers Category:Serbian people of Hungarian descent Category:Regionalliga players Category:Eredivisie players Category:1. title: Adrián Szőke
